channel.title: Gfx?
channel.description:
hey,
i need someone to answer or give me a tut for this...
is there a way to get a ::gfx command that tests the gfx like ::emote ### does?
like if you type ::emote 1, it does an emote. is there a way to create a command thats ::gfx #### and a gfx plays?
plz help :)

item.title: Gfx?
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

aah!!
thanks alot!

Read full topic

item.title: Gfx?
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

if (command.startsWith("gfx")) {
	int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));

outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(absY - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(absX - (mapRegionX * 8));
outStream.createFrame(4);
outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7)
outStream.writeWord(id);//Graphic id
outStream.writeByte(0);//height of the spell above it’s basic place, i think it’s written in pixels 100 pixels high
outStream.writeWord(0);//Time before casting the graphic

}

Read full topic
